Entries.Abigail: Jeez... this is the happiest I think I've ever seen my mom and dad.$s
Entries.Caroline: Hello, @. Do you like my flower arrangement?#$b#Black dahlias and yellow carnations look lovely together, don't they?$h
Entries.Demetrius: Every now and then I'll do genetic testing on Joja products, but the results are always... chilling, to say the least.#$b#If there's one thing we can all agree on... *their* tomatoes are *not* fruit.$s
Entries.Emily: Everyone here is happy he died... I never liked him either, but this isn't how a funeral is meant to be!$s#$b#I guess maybe I'm a bit *too* reverent...$s
Entries.Gus: The food here is horrible. All Joja branded...$s#$b#That man worshiped that company like it was a deity. Well... I hope he's happy with his life decisions, because there isn't a single person here who isn't ecstatic that he's gone.$a
Entries.Lewis: Ah... hello, @. This funeral is a bit odd; Morris insisted on Joja taking over the procedure instead of me or any of the townsfolk.#$b#So, uhh... yes, that's why everything is Joja-branded and stark blue.$s#$b#Listen, I don't like any of this either, but please, for the sake of honor, let's keep our insults to ourselves at least until he gets buried.
Entries.Linus: ...I... find myself at a bit of a loss, honestly.$s#$b#It's difficult. I know I should be mourning, but I feel almost nothing.
Entries.Marnie: JojaMart has the worst produce I've ever had... one time I bought some eggs from them because I needed them for a recipe, but my chickens weren't producing.$2#$b#They came out of the shells flowing like tree sap.$3
Entries.Pam: Damn... does this mean that JojaMart isn't gonna be around anymore?$s#$b#Oh, and, umm... I guess it's sad that he died, also.
Entries.Pierre: Wow, somebody actually showed up. What a shocker!$h#$b#Hmm? Why am *I* here, you ask?$4#$b#Lunch was provided, of course!$h
Entries.Robin: These decorations are so gaudy... I never liked the guy, but if he asked me to do the setup, I would've. Shame he never liked anyone other than Joja...$s#$b#I guess you really can't help people who don't want to be helped.
Entries.Sam: Huh. Well, guess I'm out of a job, now.#$b#Yeah, that's my only real takeaway from this.$s
Entries.Sebastian: Shame he isn't getting cremated. I would've loved to watch him burn.#$b#...#$b#What? You're looking at me like I said something disagreeable.
Entries.Shane: Morris! Oh, no, this is terrible!$10#$b#Who's gonna sign my paycheck?$10
